substitution.copyText: Ham. Indeed Sirs but this troubles me.
substitution.amendedText: Indeed, Sirs, but this troubles me.

substitution.copyText: Ham. I would I had been there.
substitution.amendedText: Ham. I would, I had been there.

substitution.copyText: Ham. Very like: staid it long?
substitution.amendedText: Ham. Very like; staid it long?

substitution.copyText: Ham. I will watch to night, | Perchance 'twill walk again.
substitution.amendedText: Ham. I will watch to nigh; | Perchance, 'twill walk again.

substitution.copyText: Let it require your silence still,
substitution.amendedText: Let it require your silence still:

substitution.copyText: I will requite your loves: So far you well,
substitution.amendedText: I will requite your loves: So fare you well.
